about.title: CELINE Winterberger - that's who I am:
about.intro: I have carried my profession in my heart for almost 20 years. I completed my training as a hairstylist and makeup artist in my homeland France, specifically at the Opera of Toulouse.
about.experience: I bring very differentiated and diverse professional experience. In addition to my apprenticeship years at the opera, I have worked in classic salons, progressive hairstyling collectives, and also as a mobile hairdresser for special events many times.
about.languages: I gladly and fluently speak French, German, English, and Spanish.
about.expertise: Furthermore, I welcome all hair types and am an expert in Balayage, Progressive techniques, but also practical, easy-care, simply put Ready-to-wear hairstyles. Some also call me the specialist for Highlights, gray coverage, or creative colorations.
about.basel_story: I have been working in Basel for about 13 years now, 5 years of which in my own beautiful and extraordinary salon. It's called «Tête-en-L'air», head in the clouds or in good German: Luftibus, just as I can sometimes be myself.
about.salon_description: Extraordinary because I have converted a former airport shuttle bus of Euro Airport into a lovely wellness oasis. The bus stands, overgrown with plants I lovingly care for, near the Basel harbor, directly on the Rhine. In an art district, a creative interim use with many inspiring projects. The area is called Holzpark Klybeck. A creative breeding ground for fine and truly extraordinary things.
about.services_title: CELINE in «Tête-en l'Air» - What I offer you in my favorite salon:
about.services_style: Extravagant, bold, unconventional, or classic? I like it the way you like it!
about.services_details: Short bangs, vibrant colors, flowing but also surprising gradations, or would you rather unexpectedly bold highlight accents?
about.care_rituals: With me, your haircare rituals are safe and you are accordingly relaxed!
about.invitation: Come aboard and let yourself be transported to distant galaxies -
about.booking: Reserve your appointment and become part of my beloved adventure as a stylist!
about.experience_description: You can expect a creative hair-cutting experience in the idyllic wild Holzpark Klybeck. In Basel, directly on the Rhine, and all this in a former shuttle bus of Euro Airport.

card1.title: Unique
card1.description: A converted Euro Airport shuttle bus transformed into a wellness oasis. Surrounded by lovingly tended plants, directly on the Rhine in the creative Holzpark Klybeck - a truly extraordinary breeding ground for fine artistry.

card2.title: Personal
card2.description: Almost 20 years of experience from Toulouse Opera House, classic salons, and progressive hairstyling collectives. I speak French, German, English, and Spanish - for truly individual and relaxed consultation.

services.title: Services
services.description: All prices include a comprehensive consultation and complimentary beverages. Final prices for color and cut are calculated based on the scope of work. Exact pricing information gladly provided on-site.
